procedures.title: Unpacking and Product Setup
preconditions: Product has arrived at installation site.
steps: Carefully open the shipping box.
Remove the ZEN 150 unit from the packaging.
Verify that all accessories and documentation are present.
Inspect the unit for any visible transportation damage.
procedures.expected_outcome: ZEN 150 and all accessories are present and free from damage, ready for further installation.

procedures.title: Countertop Placement and Electrical/Water Connection
preconditions: ZEN 150 has been unpacked and inspected.
Installation location has sufficient space and resources as per manual requirements.
steps: Place the unit on a flat, stable countertop.
Ensure adequate ventilation around the unit.
Connect the water line according to the diagram, ensuring all fittings are tight.
Connect the 48 V DC power supply to a compliant power source.
Verify electrical connections are secure.
procedures.expected_outcome: ZEN 150 is positioned on the counter with water and power properly connected for operation.

procedures.title: Touchscreen Operation - Standard Mode
preconditions: Unit is fully installed and powered.
steps: Tap the touchscreen to wake the display.
Navigate through the home screen to select 'Standard Mode.'
Follow on-screen prompts to start standard operation.
procedures.expected_outcome: ZEN 150 operates in Standard Mode as per user selection.

procedures.title: Touchscreen Operation - Maintenance Mode
preconditions: Unit is powered and touchscreen is responsive.
steps: Tap the touchscreen to access menu options.
Select 'Maintenance Mode' from the menu.
Follow prompts to perform specific maintenance functions.
procedures.expected_outcome: ZEN 150 enters Maintenance Mode, enabling authorized maintenance operations.

procedures.title: Child Safety Lock Feature Activation
steps: Access the safety settings from the touchscreen menu.
Enable the 'Child Safety Lock' feature.
Confirm activation by following screen instructions.
procedures.expected_outcome: Child Safety Lock is enabled, restricting unauthorized use.

procedures.title: Daily Cleaning Routine
preconditions: Unit is powered down or placed in cleaning mode.
steps: Wipe exterior surfaces with a soft, damp cloth.
Check and empty the drip tray if present.
Clean the dispensing area with non-abrasive cleaner.
procedures.expected_outcome: ZEN 150 exterior remains clean and sanitary according to daily cleaning standards.

procedures.title: Weekly Maintenance Routine
preconditions: Unit has been operating for one week.
steps: Inspect water line connections for leaks.
Test touchscreen functionality.
Check filter status as indicated on the maintenance menu.
Remove and rinse detachable components per manual instructions.
procedures.expected_outcome: ZEN 150's functionality is verified and routine maintenance is performed.

procedures.title: Error Code E01 Resolution
steps: Consult the troubleshooting section for E01.
Check electrical connections and ensure power source is stable.
Reset the unit by powering off and on.
If error persists, contact technical support.
procedures.expected_outcome: Error E01 is resolved and unit resumes normal operation or is marked for professional service.

procedures.title: Error Code E02 Resolution
steps: Refer to the troubleshooting section for E02.
Inspect water line and ensure water flow is not obstructed.
Ensure all water connections are properly fitted.
Reset unit and test water dispensing.
Contact technical support if issue persists.
procedures.expected_outcome: Error E02 is cleared, and water flow is restored or escalated for further assistance.
